1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breasts,2 large eggs,3 tablespoons onion,2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley,1 1/2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese,1 (1 ounce) packet dry ranch dressing mix,3/4 cup mayonnaise,1/2 teaspoon kosher salt,1/4 teaspoon pepper,1/3 cup all-purpose flour,3 tablespoons olive oil,1 tablespoon lemon juice,1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper,,
